name: Splashy Duck
overview: Save the DUCK from crashing into the WHALE! Endless FUN for EVERYONE! Help your hero DUCK by collecting the GOLD COINS while avoiding the EVIL WHALES! Experience the endless fun Off-TV on the Wii U™ GamePad controller or on the TV in glorious 1080p HD! Instant restart allows you to get back into the game quicker than ever!
